column4: hi, i just setup a ssh server, however I want to restrict the user accessing my system only their home directory and install only a few programs they can use for example psybnc, how would i do this? is this called a "jail" ?
it's called an ssh chroot, yes. It can be done.
chrooting a person into a directory with ssh is called jailing them.
